item.text: Vaginal discharge after 4 weeks of delivery
Counseling provided on:  danger signs, family planning, hygiene, nutrition, immunization, the use of insecticide-treated nets, and breastfeeding
Newborn received the standard ARV prophylaxis (ARV Px):  AZT + NVP for 6 weeks, then NVP only for 6 weeks - total 12 weeks
Feeding option:  Exclusive Breastfeeding (EBF)/ Exclusive replacement feeding (ERF)
Newborn referred to chronic HIV infant care
